params.name: period
params.replaces: AND (created_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND CURRENT_DATE())

template.last_1_year: AND (created_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND CURRENT_DATE())
template.last_3_year: AND (created_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR) AND CURRENT_DATE())
